unnormalised: Hey everyone, any news on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Chennai match on 20/07/2024. Hope it's not serious! It'd be a big loss for the team if he's out. Also, what about Bumrah? Last I heard, updates were expected by 17:00 hrs today. Wishing them a speedy recovery, like back to full form for the next IPL season in 2025. Jai Hind! Any official update from the BCCI?
normalised: Hey everyone, any news on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Chennai match on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four. Hope it's not serious! It'd be a big loss for the team if he's out. Also, what about Bumrah? Last I heard, updates were expected by five post meridiem today. Wishing them a speedy recovery, like back to full form for the next I P L season in two thousand and twenty five. Jai Hind! Any official update from the B C C I?
